item.title: Creating Your First Git Repository
item.description: ‚Üê Prev Alright, alright, alright! Now that you’ve got Git installed, it’s time to git gud (*Cue sting*). “You’re well on your way to becoming a dev.

item.title: Introduction to Git
item.description: “It’s like having a buddy who always has your back when coding in the trenches. With Git, you won’t just be coding; you’ll be coding with confidence.

item.title: Welcome to MHTN Lab!
item.description: Welcome to MHTN Lab! Greetings and salutations! You’ve stumbled upon my own personal enclave in the digital realm (I guess it’s yours too now).
